Blogs.body: I love building websites, playing a piano, and spending time with my loved loves. Particularly my girlfriend ;)

Blogs.title: New Year #2022
Blogs.body: Grateful to have made it into this brand new year alive and helathy and with all my loved ones.
Blogs.author: Henry J

Blogs.title: King Henry's Blog
Blogs.body:
This is my new blog.

Today is very hot in Cape Town. 

Th date is the 8th of JAnuary 2022 and the time is 11:56PM. I am sitting in my lounge with my windows but the air is still. 

It's really hot in here and the heat is making me want to take my mattress and sleep outside but then when I think of the mosquitoes, spiders and/ snakes which are now highly active, I am immediately discourage.

How tiresome

:(
Blogs.author: Henry Sparks
